notable_observations: Rapid expansion from localized meets (Wakad, Baner) to city-wide events.
Formation of specialized sub-groups (Ladies Group, Jobs Group) to declutter the main chat.
Strong focus on verification: New members are vetted via Google Forms before adding.
High engagement in social events like the Picnic (60+ pax) and Annual Dinner (50+ pax).
Dedicated 'SPMM Jobs' group created on Dec 3, 2025, triggering an immediate influx of 20+ job opportunities.
Active peer-to-peer career support: Members reviewing resumes, warning against scam institutes, and providing direct referrals.
Strict 'No Forward' policy enforced to maintain group quality.
